# Government Tender Announcement
### EJ196-230133 Fire Alarm Systems

#### Procurement Information
* Tender Reference: [WS3640117616 - Doc3679564014](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14188974?extsite=MTQxODg5NzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Solicitation Number: WS3640117616
* Submission Date: November 30th, 2022, 14:00 EST
* Publication Date: October 20, 2022

#### Contract Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contract Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact Information:
  * Carine Thibodeau Quinn, PSPC
  * Email: carinethibodeau.quinn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for a fire alarm system maintenance contract. The contract will provide maintenance services for the Fire Alarm, Fire Protection and Life Safety Systems at Public Work Government Services Canada located at Place Export, 234 Laurier Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6K6. The contract will be for a period of five (5) years. The required services include providing necessary tools, services, consumable items, materials, travel and labor on equipment in accordance with the Statement of Work attached as Annex A.

#### Bid Submission Requirements
Bidders must submit their bid electronically through Ariba Discovery or Canada Buys by the closing date of November 30th, 2022, at 14:00 EST. Bids received after this time will be declared non-responsive. A contract will be awarded based on the lowest price bid. The contract will be subject to the laws of Canada and the AACE-I, PE-37 2002 edition l'.

#### Goods and Services Tax (GST) 
This procurement is subject to the Goods and Services Act of Canada. Bidders must indicate if they are claiming a GST exemption in their bid submission.

#### Languages
The official languages of this procurement are English and French. Bidders are required to submit their bid documents in both languages.

#### Trade Agreements 
This procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade
